name: Next.js Middleware i18n ルーティング (概念)
description: Accept-Language での言語ルーティング

files.template:
import { NextResponse } from 'next/server';
export function middleware(req: Request){ const url = new URL(req.url); const lang = (req as any).headers.get('accept-language')?.split(',')[0]||'en'; if(url.pathname==='/' && lang.startsWith('ja')) return NextResponse.redirect(new URL('/ja', url)); return NextResponse.next(); }
